title: ‘Godzilla vs. Kong’ and Top Five Blockbusters
description:
‘Godzilla vs. Kong’ is the first major blockbuster movie event of 2021. Shea Serrano joins Sean and Amanda to discuss the winners and losers of the latest monster showdown, which is now in theaters and available on HBO Max. Then, they share their five favorite blockbusters.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Shea Serrano
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
